summary.description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | Integrated annotations and analyses of small RNA-producing loci from 47 diverse plants | plantsmallrnagenes.science.psu.edu | Plant small RNA gene annotations | Small RNA locus annotations: 2,786,895 | Small non-coding RNAs between 20 and 24 nucleotides in length function to regulate gene expression, as well as suppress accumulation of viruses | Small RNA sequencing reads: 20,896,329,960
summary.name: Plant
